With fully immersive graphics, sound, and controls, your senses will be thrust into an experience unlike any other. You will be led through a series of tasks to successfully launch the Apollo 18 and escape the moon before time runs out.</p><a href="/lunar-odyssey" target="_blank" class="main-button lolearn class="column-18 w-col w-col-2"><a href="/" aria-current="page" class="footer-logo-link w-inline-block w--current"><img src="https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/6195ec084171dc8100be4354/61b0b5e95d6c04b672abdca4_FB-Logo-Color.svg" loading="lazy" width="78" alt="" class="image-14"></a></div><div class="column-9 w-col w-col-5"><div data-animation="default" data-collapse="tiny" data-duration="400" data-easing="ease" data-easing2="ease" role="banner" class="navbar-2 w-nav"><div class="container-2 w-container"><div class="div-block"><a href="https://twitter.com/FractalBlueEnt1" target="_blank" class="link-block-2 w-inline-block"><img src="https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/6195ec084171dc8100be4354/63f6381b30fdbe78ad8d8d36_Twitter%20Icon.png" loading="lazy" width="28" alt="" class="social-icon"></a><a href="https://www.instagram.com/fractal.blue.entertainment/" target="_blank" class="w-inline-block"><img src="https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/6195ec084171dc8100be4354/619b42bc7236188112905b91_5279112_camera_instagram_social%20media_instagram%20logo_icon.svg" loading="lazy" width="28" alt="" class="social-icon"></a><a href="https://www.reddit.com/r/fractalblue/" target="_blank" class="w-inline-block"><img src="https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/6195ec084171dc8100be4354/619b42bcd963e50759b36ef1_5279117_forum_reddit_reddit%20logo_icon.svg" loading="lazy" width="28" alt="" class="social-icon"></a><a href="https://discord.gg/fractalblue" target="_blank" class="w-inline-block"><img src="https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/6195ec084171dc8100be4354/619b42bb24661948b2bd53d3_4691356_discord_icon.svg" loading="lazy" width="28" alt="" class="social-icon"></a></div></div><div class="w-nav-overlay" data-wf-ignore="" id="w-nav-overlay-1"></div></div></div></div></div><div class="div-block-29"><div class="div-block-30"><p class="paragraph mob">Fractal Blue Entertainment - Copyright 2022</p><a href="/privacy-policy-and-terms" class="link pri">PRIVACY&nbsp;POLICY</a></div><div class="div-block-31"><a href="#TopHome" class="link-block-3 w-inline-block"><img src="https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/6195ec084171dc8100be4354/61ce1b820a244ee857a4cff3_Back-To-Top-Arrow.svg" loading="lazy" width="36" alt=""></a></div></div></div><script src="https://d3e54v103j8qbb.cloudfront.net/js/jquery-3.5.1.min.dc5e7f18c8.js?site=6195ec084171dc8100be4354" type="text/javascript" integrity="sha256-9/aliU8dGd2tb6OSsuzixeV4y/faTqgFtohetphbbj0=" crossorigin="anonymous"></script><script src="https://uploads-ssl.webflow.com/6195ec084171dc8100be4354/js/webflow.d737843e5.js" type="text/javascript"></script><script> 
(function () {

    var deadline = '2022/02/22 00:00';

    function pad(num, size) {
        var s = "0" + num;
        return s.substr(s.length - size);
    }

    // fixes "Date.parse(date)" on safari
    function parseDate(date) {
        const parsed = Date.parse(date);
        if (!isNaN(parsed)) return parsed
        return Date.parse(date.replace(/-/g, '/').replace(/[a-z]+/gi, ' '));
    }

    function getTimeRemaining(endtime) {
        let total = parseDate(endtime) - Date.parse(new Date())
        let seconds = Math.floor((total / 1000) % 60)
        let minutes = Math.floor((total / 1000 / 60) % 60)
        let hours = Math.floor((total / (1000 * 60 * 60)) % 24)
        let days = Math.floor(total / (1000 * 60 * 60 * 24))

        return { total, days, hours, minutes, seconds };
    }

    function clock(id, endtime) {
        let days = document.getElementById(id + '-days')
        let hours = document.getElementById(id + '-hours')
        let minutes = document.getElementById(id + '-minutes')
        let seconds = document.getElementById(id + '-seconds')

        var timeinterval = setInterval(function () {
            var time = getTimeRemaining(endtime);

            if (time.total <= 0) {
                clearInterval(timeinterval);
            } else {
                days.innerHTML = pad(time.days, 2);
                hours.innerHTML = pad(time.hours, 2);
                minutes.innerHTML = pad(time.minutes, 2);
                seconds.innerHTML = pad(time.seconds, 2);
            }
        }, 1000);
    }

    clock('js-clock', deadline);
})();
</script>
</body></html>
